questions.circumstances: What were you doing when you fainted? (standing, sitting, exercising)
questions.warning_signs: Did you have any warning before fainting? (dizziness, nausea, vision changes)
questions.recovery: Did you recover immediately or feel confused afterward?
questions.chest_pain: Did you have chest pain before or after fainting?
questions.palpitations: Did you feel your heart racing or skipping beats?

triage_rules.reason: Syncope with cardiac symptoms - Possible arrhythmia - Immediate Emergency Care Required
Syncope during exertion - Possible cardiac cause - Emergency evaluation needed

triage_rules.expression: 'confused' in str(recovery).lower() or int(str(duration_unconscious).split()[0] if str(duration_unconscious).split() else '0') > 1
triage_rules.reason: Prolonged loss of consciousness or slow recovery - Urgent evaluation needed
